BrowserActionTitle.description: Title for the browser action that's visible to the user of extension

BrowserActionTitlePending.description: Title for the browser action that's visible to the user of extension when there are clips being uploaded in the background

BrowserActionTitleUnsaved.description: Title for the browser action that's visible to the user of extension when there are unsaved changes

EDAMError_1.description: Used to describe an unknown EDAM error

EDAMError_10.description: Indicates that there was a conflict in data

EDAMError_12.description: Indicates that given shard is unavailable

EDAMError_2.description: Data was transmitted in invalid format

EDAMError_2_mailTo.description: Indicates that user submitted at least one invalid email address
EDAMError_2_mailTo.message: En az bir geçersiz e-posta adresi

EDAMError_2_url.description: Indicates that user tried to submit invalid or unsupported URL

EDAMError_3.description: Indicates that permission was denied for request by the server

EDAMError_3_User_active.description: Indicates that a user tried to login but their account is inactive
EDAMError_3_User_active.message: Kullanıcı etkin olmadığı için erişim reddedildi

EDAMError_3_User_tooManyFailuresTryAgain.description: Indicates that a user tried to login way too many times with invalid credentials and needs to chill for a bit
EDAMError_3_User_tooManyFailuresTryAgain.message: Çok fazla sayıda başarısız oturum açma denemesi. Lütfen daha sonra tekrar deneyin

EDAMError_5.description: Indicates that some data was required in the request by the server, but wasn't found

EDAMError_5_password.description: Indicates that password field needs to be filled in

EDAMError_5_username.description: Indicates that username field needs to be filled in

EDAMError_6.description: Indicates that some kind of limit was reached

EDAMError_6_mailTo.description: Indicates that the user is exceeding number of daily emails or specified too many recepients
EDAMError_6_mailTo.message: Çok fazla e-posta adresi belirttiğiniz ya da günlük kotanızı aştığınız için bu kırpılan öğeyi e-postayla gönderemezsiniz

EDAMError_7.description: Indicates that user has exceeded their quota
EDAMError_7.message: Kota aşıldı. Hesabınızı Premium'a yükseltmeyi düşünebilirsiniz.

EDAMError_8_password.description: Indicates that user tried to sign in with incorrect username/password
EDAMError_8_password.message: Kullanıcı adı ve parola varolan kullanıcıyla eşleşmiyor

EDAMError_8_username.description: Indicates that user tried to sign in with incorrect username/password

EDAMError_9.description: Indicates that current session was expired

EDAMError_900.description: Indicates that the extension didn't pass version check
EDAMError_900.message: This version of Evernote Web Clipper is no longer compatible with Evernote Service. Please install the latest version.

EDAMResponseError_1.description: Indicates an unknown error associated with response from the request made to the server

EDAMResponseError_2.description: Indicates that the response from server was not recognizable

Error_HTTP_Transport.description: Generic error indicating that the extension could not get a response from a server

ExtensionDescription.description: Description of the extension as it's visible to the outside world
ExtensionDescription.message: Web'de gördüklerinizi Evernote hesabınıza kaydetmek için Evernote uzantısını kullanın. Notlarınız arasında arama yapmanızı da sağlar.

ExtensionName.description: Name of the extension as it's visible to the outside world

FormParsingError.description: Indicates that there was an error parsing submitted form

UnknownError.description: Used to describe an unknown error of any kind

articleClipFailure.description: Messages shown to user when the article of the page isn't clippable.
articleClipFailure.message: Maalesef, Evernote bu sayfayı makale olarak kırpamıyor. Lütfen kırpmak istediğiniz bölümü seçin.

authExpiredError.description: Error indicating that authentication token expired and user needs to relogin again.

authPersistenceError.description: Error indicating that the browser fails to persist authentication.
authPersistenceError.message: Tarayıcı tercihleriniz Evernote uzantısıyla çakışıyor. Chrome'un Gizlilik İçeriği ayarlarını varsayılan ayarlarına geri yüklemeyi deneyin: Yerel verilerin ayarlanmasına izin verin ve üçüncü taraf tanımlama bilgilerini ENGELLEMEYİN. Diğer üçüncü taraf uzantıları devre dışı bırakmayı düşünebilirsiniz.

autoSaving.description: Message indicating the the extension is currently auto-saving changes user made to the note

browserPersistenceError.description: Warning message shown to user when the browser is having problems persisting data on disk
browserPersistenceError.message:
Tarayıcı, verilerinizi diskte saklamada sorun yaşıyor ($error$).
"Kırp ve Evernote'a Gönder" uzantısı çalışmaya devam edecek, ancak kaydedilmemiş kırpılan öğeleriniz tarayıcınız yeniden başlatıldıktan sonra saklanmayacak.
Güncel değilse tarayıcınızı yükseltmeyi düşünebilirsiniz.

checkVersionWarning.description: Warning message shown to user when the client doesn't pass version check
checkVersionWarning.message: This version of Evernote Web Clipper is no longer compatible with Evernote Service. Please install the latest version.

clippingPageContent.description: Message indicating that the extension is currently clipping text from a tab

clippingToEvernote.description: Message indicating that the extensions is currently sending clip to Evernote

contentClipped.description: Title indicating that content was successfully clipped

contentPreview_clipArticle.description: Selection nudging legend for clipping article

contentPreview_expandSelection.description: Selection nudging legend for expanding selection

contentPreview_moveSelection.description: Selection nudging legend for moving selection

contentPreview_shrinkSelection.description: Selection nudging legend for shrinking selection

contentScriptTimedOut.description: Message shown to user when the page is unresponsive and the extension cannot gather any content from the webpage.
contentScriptTimedOut.message: Maalesef, Evernote bu sayfayı kırpmayı denedi, ancak sayfa yanıt vermedi. Yine de bu sayfayı içeriği olmadan URL'siyle hatırlayabilirsiniz.

contentclipper_clipping.description: Message shown on content pages to notify users that the page is being scraped for clipping... Should be as brief as possible

contextMenuClipImage.description: Context menu item for creating a new note with image

contextMenuClipPage.description: Context menu item for clipping current page

contextMenuClipSelection.description: Context menu item for clipping current selection

contextMenuClipUrl.description: Context menu item for creating a new note with just the URL of the current page

contextMenuNewNote.description: Context menu item for creating new note

contextMenuPleaseLogin.description: Help message shown to users when they try to clip content via contextual menu items but not being intially logged in
contextMenuPleaseLogin.message: Kırpma yapabilmek için öncelikle Kırp ve Evernote'a Gönder araç çubuğu düğmesini kullanarak oturum açmalısınız

deleteSuccess.description: Message indication that previously clipped note was successfully deleted

deleting.description: Message indicating that the extension is deleting previously clipped note from the server

desktopNotification_cancelFailedClip.description: Name of the action associated with cancelling the clip that failed to upload. Should be as short as possible

desktopNotification_clipProcessorSignInM.description: Message shown to users inside desktop notification informing users that they clip could not be uploaded because they are not authenticated...
desktopNotification_clipProcessorSignInM.message: Geçersiz veya süresi dolmuş kimlik doğrulama. Lütfen araç çubuğu düğmesini kullanarak oturum açın ve tekrar deneyin.

desktopNotification_clipProcessorSignInT.description: Title for desktop notification informing user that there was an error with uploading a clip. This should be as short as possible

desktopNotification_clipProcessorUnexpec.description: Error message indicating that an unexpected error occurred during an attempt to upload a single clip.
desktopNotification_clipProcessorUnexpec.message:
Beklenmedik bir hata nedeniyle kırpılan öğe yüklenemedi:
$error$

desktopNotification_clipProcessorUnexpec.description: Error message indicating that an unexpected error occurred during an attempt to upload multiple clips
desktopNotification_clipProcessorUnexpec.message:
Beklenmedik bir hata nedeniyle $count$ kırpılan öğe yüklenemedi:
$error$

desktopNotification_clipProcessorUnexpec.description: Title of the desktop notification indicating unexpected error

desktopNotification_clipUploaded.description: Headline for desktop notification indicating that clip was successfully uploaded

desktopNotification_clipUploadedMessage.description: Message indicating that clip was successfully uploaded

desktopNotification_editSuccessClip.description: Name of the action associated with editing clipped note

desktopNotification_retryFailedClip.description: Name of the action associated with retrying the clip that failed to upload. Should be as short as possible

desktopNotification_unableToSaveClip.description: Headline for desktop notifications indicating there was a problem with saving the clip

desktopNotification_unableToSaveClipUnkn.description: Headline for desktop notification indicating that there was an unknown error while uploading a clip
Description of the unknown error that may occur after the extension failed to upload a clip and now it's lost...
desktopNotification_unableToSaveClipUnkn.message: Kırpılan öğelerinizden biri kaydedilmeye çalışılırken bilinmeyen bir hata oluştu.

desktopNotification_viewFailedClip.description: Name of the action associated with viewing the URL of the clip that failed to upload. Should be as short as possible

desktopNotification_viewSuccessClip.description: Name of the actions associated with viewing clipped note

dismiss.description: Message shown on buttons to dismiss a widget of some kind

fileForm_comment.description: Label for additional text to be added to the note

fileForm_delete.description: Label for deleting previously clipped note

fileForm_done.description: Label for filing previously clipped note and/or dismissing the filing dialog

fileForm_notebook.description: Label for selection of note's notebook

fileForm_viewInEvernote.description: Title of a link to a note in Evernote

fileSuccess.description: Message indicating that changes to clipped note were successfully filed

filing.description: Message indicating that the extension is filing changes made to previously clipped note on the server

findingNotes.description: Message indicating that the extension is currently searching notes based on user provided query

fullPageClipFailure.description: Message shown to user when full page clip wasn't possible
fullPageClipFailure.message: Maalesef, Evernote bu sayfanın tamamını kırpamıyor. Lütfen kırpmak istediğiniz bölümü seçin.

fullPageClipTooBig.description: Message shown to user when the full page clip is too big to POST to the server
fullPageClipTooBig.message:
Maalesef, sayfanın tamamı Evernote'un kırpamayacağı kadar büyük.
Lütfen kırpmak istediğiniz bölümü seçin.

illegalUrlClipFailure.description: Error message shown when you try to clip from pages that aren't scriptable by the browser. Such as the chrome gallery pages.
illegalUrlClipFailure.message: Tarayıcının belirlediği kısıtlamalar nedeniyle bu sayfayı kırpamazsınız

introPageUrl.description: URL to the intro page for the extension

invalidAutoSaveClipNoteOptionValue.description: Error indicating that the user selected invalid option for the auto-save behavior

invalidExpression.description: Indicates that form's input value contains invalid expression

invalidFullPageOptionValue.description: Error indicating that the user selected invalid option for full page behavior

invalidMailTo.description: Indicates that at least one email address is not in a valid format
invalidMailTo.message: En az bir geçersiz e-posta adresi var

invalidMask.description: Indicates that user entered an expression that does not match given mask.

invalidNoteListOptionValue.description: Error indicating that the user selected invalid option for note list behavior

invalidPassword.description: Specific validation error message indicating that entered password contains invalid characters
invalidPassword.message: Parola 6 ila 64 karakter uzunluğunda olmalı ve harf, sayı ve noktalama işaretlerinden oluşmalıdır.

invalidServiceProto.description: Indicates that the supplied service protocol is invalid
invalidServiceProto.message: Geçersiz hizmet protokolü. http:// veya https:// olmalı

invalidTagName.description: Indicates that at least one tag name contains at least one invalid character
invalidTagName.message: Etiket adları herhangi bir denetim karakteri içeremez ve boşlukla başlayamaz veya bitemez

invalidTitle.description: Indicates that user entered title with invalid characters
invalidTitle.message: Başlık herhangi bir denetim karakteri içermemeli ve boşlukla başlamamalı veya bitmemelidir.

invalidUsername.description: Specific validation error message indicating that entered username is not valid
invalidUsername.message: Kullanıcı adınız bir harf veya sayıyla başlamalı ve bitmelidir, ayrıca kısa çizgiler ve alt çizgiler içerebilir.

loading.description: Message shown when extension is loading...

log_deleteFileError.description: Error message shown to user when an error occurs during deletion of a log file

log_noLogSelected.description: Alert message for when user tries to delete a log file but hasn't selected one

log_noLogsFound.description: Title of the log selection when there are no log files found

loggingIn.description: Message indicating that the extension is currently attempting to sign in user

loggingOut.description: Message indicating that the extension is currently attempting to sign out user

loginForm_login.description: Sign in button label for login form

loginForm_password.description: Label for entering password into login form

loginForm_passwordError_2.message: Parola hatalı karakterler içeriyor. Lütfen öncelikle bu hataları giderin.

loginForm_passwordError_8.message: Kullanıcı adı ve parola varolan kullanıcıyla eşleşmiyor.

loginForm_register.description: Registration button label in login form

loginForm_searchHelper.description: Label for search helper option on the login view
loginForm_searchHelper.message: Google, Bing, Yahoo ve diğerlerinde arama yaparken Evernote’da da yapın.

loginForm_username.description: Label for entering username into login form

loginForm_usernameError_2.message: Kullanıcı adı hatalı karakterler içeriyor. Lütfen öncelikle bu hataları giderin.

loginForm_usernameError_8.message: Kullanıcı adı ve parola varolan kullanıcıyla eşleşmiyor.

loginForm_whatsThis.message: Daha fazla bilgi ve desteklenen arama motorları

login_searchHelperLongDescription.description: Description of the search-helper feature as shown on the options page
login_searchHelperLongDescription.message: Etkinleştirildiğinde; desteklenen arama motorlarında yaptığınız aramalar Evernote hesabınızda da gerçekleştirilecektir. Uzantı işareti eşleşen not sayısıyla güncellenecektir. Desteklenen arama motorları şunlardır: Google, Bing, Yahoo, Yandex ve Baidu.

logs_all.description: Label for applying an operation to all log files (such as delete or export)

logs_confirmDeleteFiles.description: Confirmation message asking user whether or not they actuall want to remove log files
logs_confirmDeleteFiles.message: Bu, $count$ günlük dosyasını silecektir. Devam etmek istediğinizden emin misiniz?

logs_delete.description: Title of the button for deleting selected log

logs_export.description: Title of the button for exporting all of the logs

logs_follow.description: Label for an option to trail the logfile

logs_selectLogFile.description: Label for selecting log files for viewing

mailToNotInRange.description: Indicates that at least one email addresses in of invalid length
mailToNotInRange.message: Her e-posta adresi en az $min$ ila $max$ karakter uzunluğunda olmalıdır

mailTosNotInRange.description: Indicates that there were to many email addresses given

more.description: General purpose, capitalized word for More - as in - there's more to see/read etc.

multipleErrorsTitle.description: Title for displaying a list of errors

noteList_modifySearch.description: Message instructing user to modify their note search criteria

noteList_nothingFound.description: Message shown when there's no search results

noteSortOrder_createdAscending.description: Description of sort order used in listing notes where notes are sorted from oldest to newest by creation time

noteSortOrder_createdDescending.description: Description of sort order used in listing notes where notes are sorted from newest to oldset by creation time

noteSortOrder_updatedAscending.description: Description of sort order used in listing notes where notes are sorted from oldest to newest by updated time

noteSortOrder_updatedDescending.description: Description of sort order used in listing notes where notes are sorted from newest to oldest by updated time

notesList_loading.description: Message shown when searching for notes

notesView_myNotes.description: Title of the tab revealing user's list of notes

notes_titleAllWithCount.description: Title for the note list with note count

notes_titleForDomain.description: Title for list of notes taken from current domain

notes_titleForLocalFiles.description: Title for list of notes made from local files

notes_titleLocalFilesAndCount.description: Tab title for the list of notes made from local files and note count

notes_titleWithCount.description: Title for the note list with note count

notes_titleWithDomainAndCount.description: Title for the note list with domain and note count

notification_quotaExceeded.description: Indicates that user has exceeded their quota
notification_quotaExceeded.message: Kota aşıldı. Hesabınızı Premium'a yükseltmeyi düşünebilirsiniz.

options_autoSaveClipNote_always.description: Option for preserving changes to the note between invocations of the extension

options_clipAction.description: Label for specifying default clipping action

options_clipAction_article.description: Label for article as the default clipping action

options_clipAction_fullPage.description: Label for full-page as the default clipping action

options_clipAction_url.description: Label for url as the default clipping action

options_clipNotebook.description: Option for selecting default destination notebook for the clips

options_clipNotebook_remember.description: Option for remembering previously used notebook

options_clipNotebook_selected.description: Option for specifying which notebook to clip to by default

options_clipNotificationEnabled.description: Label for option to enable notification about successful clips

options_clipNotificationEnabledDescripti.message: Etkinleştirildiğinde, yüklenen her kırpılan öğe için size bildirim gönderilecektir. Bildirimler, kırpılan öğelerinizi görüntülemenizi, düzenlemenizi ve paylaşmanızı kolaylaştırır.

options_clipStyle.description: Label for various options regarding preservation of element styles of clipped content

options_clipStyle_full.description: Option for preserving all of the element styles of clipped content

options_clipStyle_none.description: Options for ignoring element styles of clipped content

options_clipStyle_text.description: Option for preserving styles only for the clipped text

options_enableDebuggingDescription.description: Description and warning message of the option that enables debugging
options_enableDebuggingDescription.message: Etkinleştirildiğinde, uzantı hata ayıklama modunda çalışır. Hata ayıklama modu yavaştır ve yalnızca sorunlar giderilirken kullanılmalıdır. Günlükleri görüntüle

options_failedToSave.description: Error message shown when options couldn't be saved

options_formReset.description: Message indicating to user that they reset options to defaults

options_formSaved.description: Message indicating to user that they successfully updated options

options_fullPage.description: Label for full page clipping option

options_fullPage_always.description: Option for always clipping full page

options_fullPage_never.description: Options for never clipping full page

options_fullPage_remember.description: Option for remembering previously used setting regarding full page clipping

options_insecureProto.description: Label for specifying insecure protocol option.

options_keepLogs.description: Label for specifying number of days to keep log files for

options_keepLogsDescription.message: Eski günlüklerin saklanması gereken gün sayısı. En az belirlenen süre boyunca değiştirilmeyen günlükler silinecektir. 0 değeri belirlendiğinde hiçbir günlük kaydedilmez.

options_noteList.description: Label for choosing note list behavior option

options_noteList_always.description: Option to always show note browser

options_noteList_never.description: Option to never show note browser

options_noteList_remember.description: Option to remember whether note list was open between invocations of the extension

options_noteSortOrder.description: Label for selecting note sort order

options_selectionNudgingDescription.message: Etkinleştirildiğinde, kırpa işleminden önce klavyenizi kullanarak makale seçimini değiştirebilirsiniz. "İpucu yok" ile etkinleştirme, bilgi mesajının görüntülenmesini önleyecektir. Devre dışı bırakıldığında, otomatik makale seçiminde herhangi bir düzenleme yapamazsınız.

options_selectionNudging_enabledNoprompt.description: Label for enabled selection nudging, but without showing the hits

options_simulateCheckVersionFailure.description: Label for developer option to simulate checkVersion failure

options_storedCredentials.description: Label for a set of options controls enabling users to store their credentials

options_storedCredentialsDescription.description: Educational message for users who wish to store their Evernote password. First sentence is the most critical one as it will be used in options_storedCredentialsShortDescription
options_storedCredentialsDescription.message: NOT: Parolaların saklanması diğer kişilerin bu tarayıcıyı kullanırken Evernote hesabınıza erişmesine yol açabilir. Tarayıcınızın uzantısına kaydedilen kullanıcı adını ve parolayı kalıcı olarak kaldırmak için Kırp ve Evernote'a Gönder uzantısını kaldırın veya oturumu kapatın.

options_storedCredentialsShortDescriptio.description: First sentence of the message in options_storedCredentialsDescription
options_storedCredentialsShortDescriptio.message: NOT: Parolaların saklanması diğer kişilerin bu tarayıcıyı kullanırken Evernote hesabınıza erişmesine yol açabilir.

options_useContextMenu.description: Label for option to enable clipping via contextual menu

options_useContextMenuDescription.description: Description of the contextual menu option
options_useContextMenuDescription.message: Etkinleştirildiğinde, web sayfalarını bağlamsal menü yoluyla kırpabilirsiniz. Görüntüleri sağ tıklattığınızda, seçilen metin veya sayfadaki herhangi bir bölüm ilgili kırpma seçeneklerini gösterecektir.

options_useLinkHilites.description: Label for the simultaneous search option to highlight links for notes already in the account.

options_useSearchHelperDescription.description: Description of the search-helper feature as shown on the options page
options_useSearchHelperDescription.message: Etkinleştirildiğinde; desteklenen arama motorlarında yaptığınız aramalar Evernote hesabınızda da gerçekleştirilecektir. Uzantı işareti eşleşen not sayısıyla güncellenecektir. Desteklenen arama motorları şunlardır: Google, Bing, Yahoo, Yandex ve Baidu.

options_useTabs.description: Label for option to use tabs rather than windows when opening new windows

options_useTabsDescription.message: Etkinleştirildiğinde, uzantı tarafından açılan her yeni pencere, Evernote hesabınızda bulunan

partLengthNotInRange.description: Indicates that each value, out of a list of values, should be between min and max characters long

quickNoteAction_clipFullPage.description: Label for clipping full page action

quickNoteAutoSavedDescription.description: description of auto saved quick note
quickNoteAutoSavedDescription.message: (bu notu sunucuya göndermek için Kaydet'i ya da silmek için Sil'i tıklatın)

quickNoteDescription.message: (bu sayfanın içeriğini kırpmak için, Sayfanın tamamını kırp onay kutusunu işaretleyin)

quickNote_cancel.description: Label for dismissing quick note composition dialog

quickNote_comment.description: Label for additional text to be added to the note

quickNote_discard.description: Label for dismissing auto-saved quick note

quickNote_fullPage.description: Label for allowing to clip contents of the entire page

quickNote_mailTo.description: Label for specifying email addresses to share the clip with

quickNote_mailToDescription.description: Description for the mailTo field (email this clip)
quickNote_mailToDescription.message: Virgülle ayırarak en fazla $max$ e-posta adresi girin

quickNote_notebook.description: Label for selection of note's notebook

quickNote_saveUrl.description: Label for allowing to save URL with a clip

requiredUsernameOptionValue.description: Error indicating that the user must enter a username if they choose to specify a password
requiredUsernameOptionValue.message: Parola belirtiyorsanız kullanıcı adını girmeniz gerekir

searchHelperConfirmDisable.description: Message shown to user asking confirmation to disable Simultaneous Search feature
searchHelperConfirmDisable.message: Evernote'un Eşzamanlı Arama özelliğini devre dışı bırakmak istediğinizden emin misiniz? (Bu özelliği uzantının Seçenekler sayfasından istediğiniz zaman yeniden etkinleştirebilirsiniz)

searchHelperDomainInEvernote.description: Message shown under a search result indicating that there are several notes from that domain already in the Evernote account
searchHelperDomainInEvernote.message: $domain$ etki alanındaki tüm notlar

searchHelperFoundNotes.description: Message injected into search-engine page indicating how many notes were also found in Evernote
searchHelperFoundNotes.message: $count$ not yerine yeni sekmelerde açılır

searchHelperLoginMessage.description: Message injected into search-engine page indicating that the user must login prior to seeing results.
searchHelperLoginMessage.message: Evernote'ta eşzamanlı arama yapmak için oturum açın ya da bu özelliği devre dışı bırakın.

searchHelperNoTransportError.description: Error message shown to user when there is a problem reaching the servers when doing simultaneous search.
searchHelperNoTransportError.message: Evernote sunucularına ulaşılamadığı için eşzamanlı arama şu anda kullanılamıyor.

searchHelperNotesNotFound.description: Message injected into search-engine page indicating there were no matching notes found in Evernote
searchHelperNotesNotFound.message: Evernote hesabınızda eşleşen herhangi bir not bulunamadı

searchHelperSearching.description: Message injected into search-engine page indicating that a searching is currently in process

searchHelperUrlInEvernote.description: Message shown under a search result indicating that the linked page is already in the Evernote account

signout.description: Text on a link prompting for signing out currently logged in user

syncError.description: Error message shown to user when the extension fails to synchronize

synchronizing.description: Message shown when the extension is synchronizing

tagNameNotInRange.description: Indicates that user entered a tag that's not valid in length
tagNameNotInRange.message: Her etiket $min$ ila $max$ karakter uzunluğunda olmalıdır.

tagNamesNotInRange.description: Indicates that user entered an abnormal number of tags
tagNamesNotInRange.message: Lütfen $min$ ila $max$ etiket arasında herhangi bir yere giriş yapın.

totalPartsNotInRange.description: Indicates that total number of things listed is either below minimum or above maximum number allowed

unclippablePage.description: Message inticating that the extension cannot obtain contents of a page
unclippablePage.message: Kırpmaya çalıştığınız sayfa Evernote'un kırpamayacağı bir biçimde yapılandırılmış!

valueDoesNotMatch.description: Generic validation error message for fields with value not matching expected pattern

valueNotInRange.description: Generic validation error message for values whose lenghts are outside of given range

valueNotPresent.description: Generic validation error message for required form field

valueTooLong.description: Generic validation error message for fields with length above maximum

valueTooShort.description: Generic validation error message for fields with length below minimum

viewNoteInEvernote.description: Link to a note in Evernote
